description: The latest nonce values used by an account by inspecting the mempool, microblock transactions, and anchored transactions
title: AddressNonces

last_mempool_tx_nonce.description: The latest nonce found within mempool transactions sent by this address. Will be null if there are no current mempool transactions for this address.

last_executed_tx_nonce.description: The latest nonce found within transactions sent by this address, including unanchored microblock transactions. Will be null if there are no current transactions for this address.
